# UISearchController.ScopeBarActivation.automatic

**Case**

A mode in which the system automatically determines when to show and hide the scope bar.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Constants

- **UISearchController.ScopeBarActivation.manual**: A mode that gives you manual control over when to show and hide the scope bar.
- **UISearchController.ScopeBarActivation.onTextEntry**: A mode in which the search controller shows the scope bar when typing begins in the search field, and hides it after search cancellation.
- **UISearchController.ScopeBarActivation.onSearchActivation**: A mode in which the search controller shows the scope bar when search becomes active, and hides it after search cancellation.
